thread.title: BlackRock Embraces Robo Finance Advice with Acquisition of FutureAdvisor
thread.title_full: BlackRock Embraces Robo Finance Advice with Acquisition of FutureAdvisor - WSJ

author: Anne Tergesen
title: BlackRock Embraces Robo Finance Advice with Acquisition of FutureAdvisor
text:
A big asset manager is embracing “robo” finance advice.
BlackRock Inc. said Wednesday it is purchasing FutureAdvisor, a privately held pioneer in the fast-growing business of using automated computer models to build and manage investment... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
